search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Donorbox (donorbox.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Donorbox can be found at: https://donorbox.org/pricing .

extracted_content.content:
Priced with the nonprofit in mind
---------------------------------

Fundraising solutions for every mission.

Let Donors Cover the Fees – Keep 100% of Your Donations! ![Image 1: Let Donors Cover the Fees – Keep 100% of Your Donations!](https://donorbox.org/landing_pages_assets/new-landing-pages/pricing/heart-pricing-d1fbe8eaca36932d721c086d7286d619bf0266e9e5bb7391370ac1d2159ab9a6.png)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Donorbox allows your donors to cover processing fees at checkout, and most do! This means you receive the full donation amount with no extra cost to your nonprofit.

Fees are covered by 66% of donors

![Image 2: Let Donors Cover the Fees – Keep 100% of Your Donations!](https://donorbox.org/landing_pages_assets/new-landing-pages/pricing/heart-pricing-d1fbe8eaca36932d721c086d7286d619bf0266e9e5bb7391370ac1d2159ab9a6.png)

Compare plans
-------------

|  | Standard$0/mo
+platform & processing fees | Pro$150/mo

+platform & processing fees | PremiumCustom

+platform & processing fees |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 

Team members included

A team member is defined as anyone with their own login to your Donorbox Account



 | 5 team members | 10 team members | 30 team members |
| Additional team members

 | $6/mo per team member | $6/mo per team member | $6/mo per team member |
| 

Donorbox CRM (Priced per contact)

Welcome to Donorbox CRM, a powerful all-in-one AI-driven donor management system that maximizes fundraising efficiency and boosts donor engagement.



 | check\_icon | check\_icon | check\_icon |
| 

AI Assistant

Take the guesswork out of writing fundraising letters, planning content, and more. Whether you need assistance with your emails, appeals, retention ideas, or more, AI Assistant will be there to help!



 | cross\_icon | check\_icon | check\_icon |
| 

Recurring Donation Upsell

A feature for upselling one-time supporters to recurring donors.



 | cross\_icon | cross\_icon | check\_icon |
| 

Donation Forms

Collect online donations with a form that can be copy-pasted onto your website or used as a pop-up widget



 | check\_icon | check\_icon | check\_icon |
| 

Event Ticketing

Event ticketing software built to meet the unique needs of nonprofits



 | check\_icon | check\_icon | check\_icon |
| 

Donation Pages

Tell your story, your way, with a customizable donation page that’s hosted for free by Donorbox



 | check\_icon | check\_icon | check\_icon |
| 

Crowdfunding Pages

Raise crowd-sourced funds with a customizable page that’s hosted for free by Donorbox



 | check\_icon | check\_icon | check\_icon |
| 

Peer-to-Peer

Empower your supporters to raise donations for your org campaign by linking their own supporter fundraising campaigns



 | check\_icon | check\_icon | check\_icon |
| 

Memberships

Similar to a donation form, but by donating, supporters can join various membership tiers of your choosing



 | check\_icon | check\_icon | check\_icon |
| 

QuickDonate™

Allow supporters to save their payment info and repeat their gift from a dedicated donor account with just one click



 | check\_icon | check\_icon | check\_icon |
| 

Zapier & API

Enable no-code integration with thousands of software, allowing your donor data to flow seamlessly into the tools you already love using



 | $17/mo | check\_icon | Custom |
| 

Tracking & Analytics

Track campaign and ad performance by inserting any code snippet on donation forms and hosted pages to send donation metadata to Google Ads, Google Analytics, and Meta Pixel



 | $35/mo | check\_icon | Custom |
| 

Receipt Rebranding

Remove "Powered by Donorbox" on your donation receipts. This feature is automatically enabled for Pro and Premium plans. Contact us to enable Receipt Rebranding on your Standard plan



 | $348/yr | check\_icon | check\_icon |
| 

Account Manager

Enjoy highly personalized support that anticipates your needs, guides you through challenges, and helps you take full advantage of Donorbox



 | cross\_icon | cross\_icon | check\_icon |
| 

Priority Tech Support

Watch technical headaches disappear as our team tackles your support issues with industry-leading speed



 | cross\_icon | cross\_icon | check\_icon |
| 

Guided Onboarding

A guided tour of our platform with your Account Manager to set up and utilize the features you need



 | cross\_icon | cross\_icon | check\_icon |
| 

Migration of recurring donors

Our team of experts will migrate your recurring donors to your new Donorbox account



 | $195 Flat Fee | $195 Flat Fee | Custom |
| 

Text-to-Give

Allow supporters to donate from anywhere by sending a text message. Custom Keyword lets your supporters text an abbreviated short code with your chosen keyword to start the donation process. Standard lets your supporters text a standard phone number.



 | $19/mo: Standard  
$50/mo: Custom Keyword | $19/mo: Standard  
$50/mo: Custom Keyword | Custom |
| 

Custom CSS

Add your code to our Custom CSS block to easily customize the layouts, fonts, and color schemes of each donation form



 | $85/mo | $85/mo | Custom |
| 

Fundraising Coach

Get on-demand consulting, a custom fundraising assessment, live monthly workshops, group coaching check-ins, and more



 | cross\_icon | cross\_icon | Custom |
| 

Custom Domain

Display your Donorbox campaigns under your organization’s own subdomain



 | cross\_icon | cross\_icon | check\_icon |
| 

Crypto and Stock

Accept crypto and stock donations right from your donation form.



 | cross\_icon | check\_icon | check\_icon |
| 

Donorbox Live™ Kiosk

Turn your tablet into a giving kiosk with an app that lets you accept cashless donations from cards and digital wallet payments - all while syncing donations and data seamlessly to Donorbox.



 | $50/mo - first device  
$15/mo - additional tablets  
[Card reader device sold separately](https://donorbox.org/live-kiosk) | $50/mo - first device  
$15/mo - additional tablets  
[Card reader device sold separately](https://donorbox.org/live-kiosk) | $25/mo - first device  
$15/mo - additional tablets  
[Card reader device sold separately](https://donorbox.org/live-kiosk) |
|  | [Start Fundraising with Standard](https://donorbox.org/orgs/new) | Start Fundraising with Pro | [Book a Premium Demo](https://donorbox.org/contact-premium) |

Additional integrations
-----------------------

Blackbaud Raiser’s Edge NXT

$65/mo

Natively sync all your donations, recurring plans, supporters, and campaign data to Raiser’s Edge NXT in near real time

Salesforce

$50/mo

Natively sync all your donations, recurring plans, supporters, and campaign data to Salesforce in near real time

HubSpot

$50/mo

Natively sync all your donations, recurring plans, supporters, and campaign data to HubSpot in near real time

Rock RMS

$50/mo

Integrate Rock RMS with Donorbox to sync all your recurring tithes, offerings, supporters, and fundraising data to your church CRM in near real time.

Planning Center

$50/mo

Enable real-time synchronization between Donorbox and Planning Center by automating data transfer.

Little Green Light

$50/mo

Enable real-time synchronization between Donorbox and Little Green Light by automating data transfer.

Mailchimp

$8/mo

Sync donor data with your mailing list, segment + personalize your email campaigns, and seamlessly maintain donor relations

Bank transfers
--------------

The Stripe payment processor fee is capped at USD $5 per transaction.  
The Donorbox platform fee is capped at USD $25 per transaction.

CRM & Email Marketing Pricing
-----------------------------

What do you get when you combine data-driven donor insights with cutting-edge AI functionality? A better way to fundraise. Donorbox’s nonprofit CRM software lets you connect with new donors, retain existing ones, and maximize each and every relationship, every day. All within the same platform.

Are you a new customer? Start by getting a personalized demo where we’ll answer any questions and give you a tour of the CRM. Already a Donorbox customer? Get started within the platform on your onboarding page.

How many contacts do you have?

50010002,5005,00010,000+

[Join the Waitlist](https://share.hsforms.com/1_M-u5DrwRGapwsXs3ZprqQ4qc9c?__hstc=254822423.f9ff67e9af74844eba8309fbfbe68d74.1744726658728.1744726658728.1744726658728.1&__hssc=254822423.1.1744726658728&__hsfp=608284045)

Why do I need a payment processor?
----------------------------------

As a leading donation platform, Donorbox partners with Stripe and PayPal to deliver funds from your donors directly to you. We don’t hold your donations, increasing the security and speed at which you receive them.

Connect Stripe, PayPal, or both to accept nearly every payment method.

### Payment processing fee

(Registered 501(c)(3) nonprofits, U.S. & Canada)

#### Stripe

Credit card processing fee

2.2% + 30¢

#### Via bank transfer

ACH bank transfer fee

0.8% ($5 maximum)

OR

#### PayPal / Venmo

Payment processing fee

1.99% + 49¢

Registered 501(c)(3) nonprofits receive a discount on payment  
processing fees with Stripe and PayPal. Please email  
[nonprofit@stripe.com](mailto:nonprofit@stripe.com) and apply at [PayPal's Nonprofit Center.](http://www.paypal.com/charities/)

Outside the US & Canada? [View Stripe nonprofit discounts by country](https://donorbox.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360020292952-Can-nonprofits-get-discounted-processing-fees)

Non-registered businesses within the U.S. & Canada - 2.9% + 30¢ (via Stripe).  
Non-registered businesses outside the U.S. & Canada [click here](https://donorbox.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360022492632-What-is-Stripe-s-international-pricing-)

Donorbox vs. competitors
------------------------

| Platform | Platform Fees |
| --- | --- |
| Donorbox | 2.95% |
| Classy | 3% \+ annual subscription |
| Fundly | 4.9% |
| Donately | 4% |
| Funraise | 5% |
| CauseVox | 2 - 4.5% |
| Fundraise Up | 4% |

Trusted by world-changers big and small
---------------------------------------

![Image 3: Trusted by world-changers big and small](https://donorbox.org/landing_pages_blobs/images/home/for-the-love-of-alex.png)

### "Normally we don't get donations that big"

— Austin B. Meadows, Executive Director at For the Love of Alex

[Watch how Donorbox helped For The Love of Alex fuel their mission.](https://donorbox.org/for-the-love-of-alex)

![Image 4: Nonprofit Software](https://donorbox.org/landing_pages_blobs/images/home/capterra-badge.png)

Nonprofit Software

Top Performer

Donation Management Software

Top Performer

Fundraising Software

Top Performer

![Image 5: Capterra](https://donorbox.org/landing_pages_blobs/images/home/capterra-rating.png)Top Rated on Capterra  
4.8/5 (123)

The fundraising engine of choice for successful nonprofits.
-----------------------------------------------------------

Donations raised

Hoping to fundraise for free?
-----------------------------

Approximately 80% of donors cover 100% of fees when given the option, so your organization gets the benefit of a professional donation platform with none of the cost.

[Sign up](https://donorbox.org/orgs/new)![Image 7: Hoping to fundraise for free?](https://donorbox.org/landing_pages_assets/new-landing-pages/exit-intent-popup/free-to-start-4a1fb2b2ae5a540d9b4e1264325ec7f73eaf57762bd677a42e5a67eea1391337.svg)

**FAQ**

*   **Where available?** Available to US based organizations only.
*   **Where do funds go?** Both crypto and stock donations will be liquidated upon confirmation and sent to you in check form. You will not receive the cryptocurrency/stock assets.
*   **Transaction fee?** Crypto and Stock has a unique transaction fee of 3.95% total per transaction. This includes both the Donorbox platform fee and the payment processing fee.
